column1: A funeral mass for Wilma Raye Garvey will be held at 11:00 a.m. on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at the St. Lawrence Catholic Church in Lawrenceville. A time of visitation will held at St. Lawrence on Wednesday from 10:00 a.m. until service time at 11:00 a.m. Burial will take place at Lawrenceville City Cemetery.
